title: I don't like Irelia as she is strong but is the change a bit too drastic?
body:
Irelia
Ionian Fervor (Passive) 
_**[Removed] No longer deals bonus damage to shields at max stacks**_

Vanguard's Edge (R)
wall damage increased from 75/125/175 to 125/200/275
slow potency increased from 60% to 90%
wall duration lowered from 2.5/3/3.5 to 2.5 at all levels
_**[Removed] No longer disarms enemies passing through the wall**_

She was loved because she is unique but they basically remove whatever was unique on Irelia. I don't like Irelia but I'm sure this isn't the right way to change her.

replies.body:
Why the Disarm removal?!?!? That was her primary way of zoning asc's or prevent them from critting her to death.
For bonus damage to shields Idk, seemed like a good thinf when dealing with shield tanks or bruisrs or shuelded adc's(like kai'sa), but guess she has enough true damage to deal with the first two.

So they remove what made her unique and slapped a bunch of damage on and called it a day what the fuck

Now Irelia's only viable build is going to be single target assassin, and that's the play style she'll be used as, rather than teamfight captain. Why don't you nerf her targeted damage on individual targets to give people a fighting chance in skirmishes while retaining her identity as a dasher?

The bonus damage to shields is a dumb gimmick.

The disarm, though, is something Riot should double down on. Lower the wall damage, increase the disarm duration.
Ya the disarm removal is pretty weird, considering that was something unique to her.

Bwahahahahaha! Nice rework you got there, Rito.

Gawd dayum, that feels good to see.

I’m up for anything that makes her less overloaded.

Her passive still gives her AD scaling on hit magic damage with attack speed, so it’s not like it’s really any weaker.

And, let’s be honest here, the disarm was nothing more than a nod to her lore and what she did to {{champion:50}}, there was really no other reason something so powerful was on her kit. And it’s still an AOE Slow zone with high base damage that can still slow a second time PLUS resets her bladesurge.

I think she may be weak after these changes, but these changes did need to happen.

The only thing I find unecissary is the wall duration nerf. Without the disarm there that seems a little too much of a hit. I’m also skeptical about the change to minion damage, I guess it’ll limit her mobility and be easier to balance with lower bonus damage and flat numbers, but that seems too low.
